00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 import roslib
00004 import sys
00005 import rospy
00006 from geometry_msgs.msg import Vector3, Vector3Stamped
00007 import numpy as np
00008 from uav_utils import ThermalRise
00009 from mathutils import saturation, quat2Reb
00010 from math import floor, exp
00011 from last_letter.msg import SimStates, SimSensor3, Environment
00012 
00013 #######################  Gyroscope Class  #########################################################
00014 
00015 class Gyroscope():
00016         def __init__(self,name):
00017 
00018                 rospy.loginfo('Create ' + name +' Sensor')
00019 
00020                 self.dt = 1.0/rospy.get_param(name+'/rate', 100.0)
00021                 self.rate =  rospy.Rate(rospy.get_param(name+'/rate', 100.0))
00022                 rospy.loginfo("\ta.rate: %.1f Hz",1.0/self.dt)
00023 
00024                 self.cp =  np.array(rospy.get_param(name+'/CP', [0.0, 0.0, 0.0])).reshape(3,1)
00025                 rospy.loginfo("\tb.position: [%.2f,%.2f,%.2f]", self.cp[0],self.cp[1],self.cp[2])
00026 
00027                 self.resolution = rospy.get_param(name+'/resolution', 0.0001)
00028                 rospy.loginfo("\tc.resolution: %.1e rad/s",self.resolution)
00029 
00030                 self.maxvalue = rospy.get_param(name+'/max', 9.0)
00031                 rospy.loginfo("\td.maxvalue: %.2f rad/s",self.maxvalue)
00032 
00033                 self.std_coeff = rospy.get_param(name+'/std_coeff', [0.0,0.0,0.0])
00034                 rospy.loginfo("\te.noise coeff:")
00035                 rospy.loginfo("\t\t1.main std: %.3f",self.std_coeff[0])
00036                 rospy.loginfo("\t\t2.bias coeff: %.3f",self.std_coeff[1])
00037                 rospy.loginfo("\t\t3.random walk coeff: %.3f",self.std_coeff[2])
00038 
00039                 #Noise Characteristics
00040                 self.bs = np.random.normal(0,rospy.get_param(name+'/scaleBias', 0.03)/3,3)
00041                 self.ks = np.random.normal(0,rospy.get_param(name+'/scaleThermal', 0.002)/3,3)
00042                 self.bb = np.random.normal(0,rospy.get_param(name+'/offsetBias', 0.785)/3,3)
00043                 self.kb = np.random.normal(0,rospy.get_param(name+'/offsetThermal', 0.0084)/3,3)
00044                 self.p0 = rospy.get_param(name+'/RWPSD', 0.00392)
00045                 self.bias=Vector3()
00046                 self.randomwalk=Vector3()
00047                 self.scale = Vector3()
00048                 
00049                 self.temp=25.0
00050                 
00051                 self.measurement = SimSensor3()
00052 
00053                 self.pub = rospy.Publisher(name, SimSensor3)
00054                 self.states_sub = rospy.Subscriber("states",SimStates,self.StatesCallback)
00055                 self.atm_sub = rospy.Subscriber("environment",Environment,self.EnvironmentCallback)
00056 
00057                 self.real=SimStates()
00058                 self.realnew=False
00059                 
00060                 #Thermal Chracteristics
00061                 self.thermalMass = ThermalRise(name)
00062                 rospy.loginfo("\tf.Loading Thermal Chracteristics")
00063                 self.airspeed = 0.0
00064                 self.temp=25.0
00065 
00066 
00067         def iterate(self,states):
00068                 Reb = quat2Reb(states.pose.orientation)
00069 
00070                 rw_noise = np.random.normal(0,self.p0,3)
00071                 self.randomwalk.x +=self.dt*rw_noise[0]
00072                 self.randomwalk.y +=self.dt*rw_noise[1]
00073                 self.randomwalk.z +=self.dt*rw_noise[2]
00074                 
00075                 self.bias.x = self.bb[0] + self.kb[0] * (self.temp - 298.15)
00076                 self.bias.y = self.bb[1] + self.kb[1] * (self.temp - 298.15)
00077                 self.bias.z = self.bb[1] + self.kb[1] * (self.temp - 298.15)
00078                 
00079                 self.scale.x = self.bs[0] + self.ks[0] * (self.temp - 298.15)
00080                 self.scale.y = self.bs[1] + self.ks[1] * (self.temp - 298.15)
00081                 self.scale.z = self.bs[2] + self.ks[2] * (self.temp - 298.15)
00082 
00083                 self.measurement.axis.x = (1+self.scale.x)*states.velocity.angular.x + self.bias.x + self.randomwalk.x
00084                 self.measurement.axis.y = (1+self.scale.y)*states.velocity.angular.y + self.bias.y + self.randomwalk.y
00085                 self.measurement.axis.z = (1+self.scale.z)*states.velocity.angular.z + self.bias.z + self.randomwalk.z
00086 
00087                 self.measurement.axis.x = saturation(floor(self.measurement.axis.x/self.resolution)*self.resolution,-self.maxvalue, self.maxvalue)
00088                 self.measurement.axis.y = saturation(floor(self.measurement.axis.y/self.resolution)*self.resolution,-self.maxvalue, self.maxvalue)
00089                 self.measurement.axis.z = saturation(floor(self.measurement.axis.z/self.resolution)*self.resolution,-self.maxvalue, self.maxvalue)
00090                 
00091                 self.tempOffset = self.thermalMass.step(self.airspeed,self.dt)
00092                 self.measurement.temperature = self.temp + self.tempOffset
00093 
00094 
00095         def StatesCallback(self,data):
00096                 self.real=data
00097                 self.realnew=True
00098 
00099         def EnvironmentCallback(self,data):
00100                 self.temp=data.temperature
00101                 if self.realnew:
00102                         self.airspeed = np.sqrt(pow(self.real.velocity.linear.x - data.wind.x,2) + pow(self.real.velocity.linear.y - data.wind.y,2) + pow(self.real.velocity.linear.z - data.wind.z,2))
00103                         
00104 
00105 ###################################################################################################     
00106 #######################  Main Program  ############################################################
00107 ###################################################################################################     
00108 if __name__ == '__main__':
00109         rospy.init_node('gyro_model')
00110 
00111         fullname = rospy.get_name().split('/')
00112         gyro = Gyroscope(fullname[-1])
00113 
00114         while not rospy.is_shutdown():
00115                 if gyro.realnew:
00116                         gyro.realnew=False
00117                         gyro.iterate(gyro.real)
00118                         gyro.measurement.header.stamp=rospy.Time.now()
00119                 gyro.pub.publish(gyro.measurement)
00120                 gyro.rate.sleep()
